title: Windows Exploitation Tricks: Trapping Virtual Memory Access (2025 Update)
summary:
Posted by James Forshaw, Google Project Zero

Back in 2021 I wrote a blog post about various ways you can build a virtual memory access trap primitive on Windows.

title: PyPI now supports archiving projects
summary: By Facundo Tuesca PyPI now supports marking projects as archived.

title: Healthcare Sector Charts 2 More Ransomware Attacks
summary: No ransomware groups have yet to claim responsibility for either attack, and both institutions have yet to reveal what may have been stolen.

title: New Jailbreaks Allow Users to Manipulate GitHub Copilot
summary: Whether by intercepting its traffic or just giving it a little nudge, GitHub's AI assistant can be made to do malicious things it isn't supposed to.

title: Automated Pen Testing Is Improving — Slowly
summary: The rate of evolution has been glacial, but tools now understand cloud environments and can target Web applications.

title: Exposure Management Provider CYE Acquires Solvo
summary: The addition of Solvo CSPM to CYE Hyver aims to address the need for multicloud vulnerability monitoring and risk assessment.

title: Fake Videos of Former First Lady Scam Namibians
summary: Amateurish financial scams are common across Africa, and Namibia's influential former first lady, Monica Geingos, has emerged as a particularly effective host body for these messages.

title: High-profile cyberattacks dent CISOs’ crisis confidence, sparking surge in 2025 crisis simulation budgets
summary: After facing barriers to handling cybersecurity crises in 2024, 74% of CISOs indicate their organisations will increase budgets for crisis simulation exercises in 2025.

title: SQL Injection, Insufficient ACLs in Frappe Framework, Frappe Learning & Frappe Press
summary: In this long-due post I describe some security vulnerabilities I found in Frappe Framework1, Frappe Learning2 and Frappe press3.
